text: Christian Provenzano is a Canadian politician, who was elected mayor of Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario in the 2014 municipal election."City Elections: What Happened Across the Province" . The Agenda, October 28, 2014. == Career == The nephew of former federal Member of Parliament Carmen Provenzano,"Provenzano seeks mayoral seat" . Sault Star, September 2, 2014. he previously ran for election to Parliament as the Liberal candidate in the electoral district of Sault Ste. Marie in the 2006 federal election and the 2011 federal election. He used to worked for the Liberal Party as chief of staff to former leader Michael Ignatieff. He secured re-election to a second term by a wide margin in the 2018 municipal election,"Provenzano elected for second term". Sault Star, October 22, 2018. garnering 70.15% of the vote."Official 2018 Municipal Election Results". Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario ==References== Category:Mayors of Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario Category:Canadian political consultants Category:Living people Category:Candidates in the 2006 Canadian federal election Category:Candidates in the 2011 Canadian federal election Category:Canadian people of Italian descent Category:Liberal Party of Canada candidates for the Canadian House of Commons Category:Year of birth missing (living people) * Sault Ste. Marie City Council * Sault Ste. Marie City Hall
title: Christian Provenzano
